message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor, knowing you'll get a better deal next round if you reject.

I understand you want a fair split, but I'm going to take advantage of the inflation. 65/35 in my favor is still a reasonable offer, considering the value is decreasing for both of us. I'm willing to negotiate further, but only if you accept.

I'm willing to compromise a little further, but I won't let you take advantage of the inflation.  Let's split 55/45 in my favor, considering the value is decreasing faster for you.  This is a fair offer, given the circumstances.
